medical_answer.canonical_answer:
Based on the provided evidence, there appear to be two notable Pratik Rais:

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:
  - B.Tech in Production and Industrial Engineering from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:
- A Muay Thai fighter from the United Kingdom
- Professional fight record of 2 wins, 1 loss (all by decision)
- Competes at 74 kg/163 lbs weight class
- Orthodox stance fighter
- Active in 2023-2024 in competitions like Combat Fight Series and The Road to CFS

Since you haven't specified which Pratik Rai you're interested in, these are the two most comprehensively documented individuals named Pratik Rai in the provided evidence. Each has distinct professional achievements in their respective fields - academia and combat sports.

The evidence also shows some other individuals named Pratik Rai in creative fields (writer/director on IMDb), but there is minimal information provided about these roles.
medical_answer.warnings: ℹ️ This information is educational only and does not replace professional medical advice.

## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. - Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

output.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
output.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

Paper-work in progress Yet to be updated

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

Paper-work in progress Yet to be updated

Academic Service Yet to be updated

Ph.D. Guideship Yet to be updated

Awards Yet to be updated

Media Coverage Yet to be updated

medical_answer.canonical_answer:
Based on the provided evidence, there appear to be two notable Pratik Rais:

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:
  - B.Tech in Production and Industrial Engineering from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:
- A Muay Thai fighter from the United Kingdom
- Professional fight record of 2 wins, 1 loss (all by decision)
- Competes at 74 kg/163 lbs weight class
- Orthodox stance fighter
- Active in 2023-2024 in competitions like Combat Fight Series and The Road to CFS

Since you haven't specified which Pratik Rai you're interested in, these are the two most comprehensively documented individuals named Pratik Rai in the provided evidence. Each has distinct professional achievements in their respective fields - academia and combat sports.

The evidence also shows some other individuals named Pratik Rai in creative fields (writer/director on IMDb), but there is minimal information provided about these roles.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

## Education:

## Date of Joining:

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

medical_answer.canonical_answer:
Based on the provided evidence, there appear to be two notable Pratik Rais:

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:
  - B.Tech in Production and Industrial Engineering from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:
- A Muay Thai fighter from the United Kingdom
- Professional fight record of 2 wins, 1 loss (all by decision)
- Competes at 74 kg/163 lbs weight class
- Orthodox stance fighter
- Active in 2023-2024 in competitions like Combat Fight Series and The Road to CFS

Since you haven't specified which Pratik Rai you're interested in, these are the two most comprehensively documented individuals named Pratik Rai in the provided evidence. Each has distinct professional achievements in their respective fields - academia and combat sports.

The evidence also shows some other individuals named Pratik Rai in creative fields (writer/director on IMDb), but there is minimal information provided about these roles.
medical_answer.warnings: ℹ️ This information is educational only and does not replace professional medical advice.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

medical_answer.canonical_answer:
Based on the provided evidence, there appear to be two notable Pratik Rais:

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:
  - B.Tech in Production and Industrial Engineering from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:
- A Muay Thai fighter from the United Kingdom
- Professional fight record of 2 wins, 1 loss (all by decision)
- Competes at 74 kg/163 lbs weight class
- Orthodox stance fighter
- Active in 2023-2024 in competitions like Combat Fight Series and The Road to CFS

Since you haven't specified which Pratik Rai you're interested in, these are the two most comprehensively documented individuals named Pratik Rai in the provided evidence. Each has distinct professional achievements in their respective fields - academia and combat sports.

The evidence also shows some other individuals named Pratik Rai in creative fields (writer/director on IMDb), but there is minimal information provided about these roles.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

Paper-work in progress Yet to be updated

Academic Service Yet to be updated

Ph.D. Guideship Yet to be updated

2023-07-07

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

output.text:
Hello! PharmaMiku here! ✨ Let me help you learn about two notable people named Pratik Rai! 

First Pratik Rai - Academic Professional:
• Currently works as Assistant Professor at TAPMI
• Serves as Co-Chair of Office of Examinations
• Expert in Operations and Decision Science
• Educational background includes:
  - B.Tech from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD from IIM Ranchi
• Research focuses on:
  - Healthcare supply chains
  - Vaccine distribution systems
  - Reliability engineering
• Has published important papers about vaccine supply chains and digital health programs

Second Pratik Rai - Professional Fighter:
• Competes in Muay Thai (a form of martial arts)
• Based in the United Kingdom
• Professional fight statistics:
  - 2 wins
  - 1 loss
  - All matches decided by judges
• Competes at 74 kg weight class
• Active fighter in 2023-2024
• Participates in:
  - Combat Fight Series
  - The Road to CFS events

Additional Note:
• There are other people named Pratik Rai in creative fields (like writing/directing), but we have limited verified information about them

For More Information:
You can check these sources:
• Academic Pratik Rai: https://www.tapmi.edu.in/faculty/pratik-rai/
• Fighter Pratik Rai: https://www.tapology.com/fightcenter/fighters/339606-pratik-rai

While this isn't medical information, I hope this helps answer your question clearly! If you're interested in learning more specific details about either person, please feel free to ask! 🌟

medical_answer.canonical_answer:
Based on the provided evidence, there appear to be two notable Pratik Rais:

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:
  - B.Tech in Production and Industrial Engineering from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:
- A Muay Thai fighter from the United Kingdom
- Professional fight record of 2 wins, 1 loss (all by decision)
- Competes at 74 kg/163 lbs weight class
- Orthodox stance fighter
- Active in 2023-2024 in competitions like Combat Fight Series and The Road to CFS

Since you haven't specified which Pratik Rai you're interested in, these are the two most comprehensively documented individuals named Pratik Rai in the provided evidence. Each has distinct professional achievements in their respective fields - academia and combat sports.

The evidence also shows some other individuals named Pratik Rai in creative fields (writer/director on IMDb), but there is minimal information provided about these roles.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

Paper-work in progress Yet to be updated

Academic Service Yet to be updated

Ph.D. Guideship Yet to be updated

Awards Yet to be updated

Media Coverage Yet to be updated

evidence.title: Pratik Rai - Fight Record
evidence.content:
# Pratik Rai

- Record: 2-1-0
- Nationality: United Kingdom

- Last Weight: 74.00 kg / 163 lb
- Stance: Orthodox
- Social's:

## Fight Record

Aaron Duvigneau LOSS Decision The Road To CFS 5 24th August 2024 Aaron Duvigneau defeated Pratik Rai by decision. Mos Hannan WIN Decision Combat Fight Series 19 6th July 2024 Pratik Rai defeated Mos Hannan by decision. Maliq Mitchell WIN Decision The Road To CFS 1 18th February 2023 Pratik Rai defeated Maliq Mitchell by decision.

## Fight Videos

medical_answer.canonical_answer:
Based on the provided evidence, there appear to be two notable Pratik Rais:

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:
  - B.Tech in Production and Industrial Engineering from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:
- A Muay Thai fighter from the United Kingdom
- Professional fight record of 2 wins, 1 loss (all by decision)
- Competes at 74 kg/163 lbs weight class
- Orthodox stance fighter
- Active in 2023-2024 in competitions like Combat Fight Series and The Road to CFS

Since you haven't specified which Pratik Rai you're interested in, these are the two most comprehensively documented individuals named Pratik Rai in the provided evidence. Each has distinct professional achievements in their respective fields - academia and combat sports.

The evidence also shows some other individuals named Pratik Rai in creative fields (writer/director on IMDb), but there is minimal information provided about these roles.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

2023-07-07

medical_answer.canonical_answer:
Based on the provided evidence, there appear to be two notable Pratik Rais:

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:
  - B.Tech in Production and Industrial Engineering from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:
- A Muay Thai fighter from the United Kingdom
- Professional fight record of 2 wins, 1 loss (all by decision)
- Competes at 74 kg/163 lbs weight class
- Orthodox stance fighter
- Active in 2023-2024 in competitions like Combat Fight Series and The Road to CFS

Since you haven't specified which Pratik Rai you're interested in, these are the two most comprehensively documented individuals named Pratik Rai in the provided evidence. Each has distinct professional achievements in their respective fields - academia and combat sports.

The evidence also shows some other individuals named Pratik Rai in creative fields (writer/director on IMDb), but there is minimal information provided about these roles.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

Hello! PharmaMiku here! ✨ Let me help you learn about two notable people named Pratik Rai! 

First Pratik Rai - Academic Professional:
• Currently works as Assistant Professor at TAPMI
• Serves as Co-Chair of Office of Examinations
• Expert in Operations and Decision Science
• Educational background includes:
  - B.Tech from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD from IIM Ranchi
• Research focuses on:
  - Healthcare supply chains
  - Vaccine distribution systems
  - Reliability engineering

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

Paper-work in progress Yet to be updated

Awards Yet to be updated

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:

  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:

- Orthodox stance fighter

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

medical_answer.canonical_answer:
Based on the provided evidence, there appear to be two notable Pratik Rais:

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:
  - B.Tech in Production and Industrial Engineering from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:
- A Muay Thai fighter from the United Kingdom
- Professional fight record of 2 wins, 1 loss (all by decision)
- Competes at 74 kg/163 lbs weight class
- Orthodox stance fighter
- Active in 2023-2024 in competitions like Combat Fight Series and The Road to CFS

Since you haven't specified which Pratik Rai you're interested in, these are the two most comprehensively documented individuals named Pratik Rai in the provided evidence. Each has distinct professional achievements in their respective fields - academia and combat sports.

The evidence also shows some other individuals named Pratik Rai in creative fields (writer/director on IMDb), but there is minimal information provided about these roles.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

1. Academic Pratik Rai:
- Currently an Assistant Professor & Co-Chair of Office of Examinations at TAPMI
- Specializes in Operations and Decision Science
- Education includes:
  - B.Tech in Production and Industrial Engineering from NIT Jamshedpur
  - M.Tech from IIT Delhi
  - PhD in Operations Management from IIM Ranchi
- Research interests include reliability engineering, healthcare supply chain quality, and vaccine supply chain performance
- Has published papers on vaccine supply chains and digitalization in immunization programs

2. Fighter Pratik Rai:
- A Muay Thai fighter from the United Kingdom
- Professional fight record of 2 wins, 1 loss (all by decision)
- Competes at 74 kg/163 lbs weight class
- Orthodox stance fighter
- Active in 2023-2024 in competitions like Combat Fight Series and The Road to CFS

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

Teaching Interest Yet to be updated

Research Interest

- Research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management
- Multi Criteria Decision Making
- Fuzzy Sets
- Healthcare Supply Chain Quality
- Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility

Training & Consultation

###### Conferences and Workshops

###### Peer reviewed Conference Proceeding(s) (Full Paper)

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022, December). A Comparative Evaluation Model for Assessing Solar Energy Capacity Development of Multiple Geographical Alternatives. In *2022 IEEE International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Engineering Management (IEEM)*(pp. 1187-1191). IEEE.
- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

Paper-work in progress Yet to be updated

Academic Service Yet to be updated

Ph.D. Guideship Yet to be updated

Awards Yet to be updated

Media Coverage Yet to be updated

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

Teaching Cases

- Decision Sciences
- Operation Management
- Excel and Statistics Primer

- Multi Criteria Decision Making

- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2020). A framework for measuring supply chain quality for a healthcare organization, Proceedings of the 10thInternational Conference on Operations and Supply Chain Management, 2020
- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2022) A Comparative Evaluation of Renewable Energy Capacity Development in North-Eastern States of India, Proceedings of 2ndInternational Operations and Supply Chain Management Conference, Warangal, India.

evidence.title: PRATIK RAI - TAPMI
evidence.content:
## PRATIK RAI

## Designation:

Assistant Professor & Co- Chair: Office of Examinations

## Area:

Operations and Decision Science

## Education:

B.Tech – Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand M.Tech – Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India Phd. – Operations Management Area from Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand

## Date of Joining:

2023-07-07

Biography Pratik Rai has completed his doctoral internal defence in Operations Management at the Indian Institute of Management Ranchi, Jharkhand and the thesis is out for external defence. He did his Bachelor’s degree in Production and Industrial Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jamshedpur, Jharkhand, India, and Master’s degree in Industrial Tribology and Maintainence Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Delh, India. His research interest area includes Reliability Engineering and Management, Multi Criteria Decision Making, Fuzzy Sets, Healthcare Supply Chain Quality, and Vaccine Supply Chain Performance and Flexibility.

Published Papers

- Rai, P., & Bera, S. (2024). Machine learning-based empirical investigation of user’s perception of digitalisation in pandemic immunisation programs. *Journal of Decision Systems*, 1-27. [https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492](https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/12460125.2024.2365492)
- [Rai, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pratik%20Rai), [Bera, S.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Sasadhar%20Bera)and [Ray, P.](https://www.emerald.com/insight/search?q=Pritee%20Ray) (2022), “Assessing technological impact on vaccine supply chain performance”, [Industrial Management & Data Systems](https://www.emerald.com/insight/publication/issn/0263-5577), Vol. 122 No. 8, pp. 1938-1955. [https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488](https://doi.org/10.1108/IMDS-08-2021-0488) (ABDC-A)

- Excel and Statistics Primer

- Banerjee, S. C., Banerjee, S., & Rai, P. (2022, October). Vaccine Supply Optimization and Forecasting using Random Forest and ARIMA Models. In *2022 IEEE 3rd Global Conference for Advancement in Technology (GCAT)*(pp. 1-5). IEEE.
